name: Wrist Support w/splint
descr: Provides firm, comfortable support for carpal tunne syndrome and weak injured wrists. The splint immobilizes wrist in natural position, relieving pain and helping to prevent re-injury. Ventilated elastic combines cool comfort and firm support. Adjustable wrist tabs and wrap around strap for perfect fit. Direct compression around the wrist joint helps immobililze the wrist.
